people.name: Spoken word
people.description: Spoken word is an oral art that focuses on the aesthetics of word play and intonation and voice inflection.

cities.name: Cairo
cities.description: Cairo  is the capital and largest city of Egypt.  The city's metropolitan area is the largest in the Middle East and the Arab world, and 15th-largest in the world, and is associated with Ancient Egypt, as the famous Giza pyramid complex and the ancient city of Memphis are located in its geographical area.
